content:
V prednjo šipo je priletel kamen, zelo verjetna je menjava. Na njej sta naša in avstrijska letna vinjeta. Velika verjetnost je, da računa (obe sta kupljeni pri nas in sta na enem računu) ne bom več našel. Za našo mi je postopek znan, rabim samo odrezan del šipe z vinjeto, pa gasa na dars, kako pa je z avstrijsko pa se mi ne sanja. Mogoče ima že kdo izkušnjo z menjavo šipe in vinjete na njej ter kako je to rešil z astrijci, pa naj informacije šera z nami.

hvala in lp
author: ergo

content:
Ali je med letno in 2-mesecno razlika tudi v lepilu in varnostnih mehanizmih?
Ker takratke sem do sedaj vedno brez tezav odlimal in bi jo lahko tudi prenesel na drugo vozilo.
Je pa bila pred vetrobranskim steklom vedno prej nekajkrat "nalepljena" na hlace ali pulover.
author: blazko

content:
Obrazec 

Na dnu je seznam stvari ki jih je potrebno priložit.
author: crnobog

content:
p...izda računa verjetno ne bom našel. A so res toliko zagovedani, da se je ne da dobiti brez računa? Saj ukrasti je nisem mogel, niti ponarediti....pri dol potegu pa bo murphy naredil svoje...
A ve kdo, če se da zadevo urediti na MP Šentilj na A strani?
author: ergo

content:
Tukaj je navedeno, kako postopati v takem primeru >> http://www.asfinag.at/toll/toll-sticker/faq

Lahko dobis novo vinjeto ali pa refundiran nakup, ce si novo ze nabavil... Pogoji so podobni kot pri nas ... Rabis drugi del vinjete (tisti spodnji odrezek, ki ostane po lepljenju vinjete, kopijo racuna servisne delavnice, ki je opravila menjavo stekla ...


  The windscreen is broken and must be replaced. What happens with the toll sticker? 
In the event of a broken windscreen (e.g. stone strike), the owner of an Austrian annual toll sticker will receive either a refund or a replacement toll sticker. For this, you will need:
 
 a copy of the registration certificate,
the detached original annual toll sticker including the lower portion of the toll sticker (= backing film),
a copy of the workshop's repair invoice for the replaced windscreen (please ensure that it shows the driver's name, especially for company cars), and
the completed, signed form for toll sticker replacement (broken windscreen) or for refund (broken windscreen).
Further the invoice of the new tollst sticker (for newly registered cars purchase date must not be longer than a month)
 YOU CAN OBTAIN THE REPLACEMENT TOLL STICKER AT THE FOLLOWING LOCATIONS: 
ÖAMTC (for non-members: processing fee of EUR 10.00)
ARBÖ (for non-members: processing fee of EUR 10.00)
ASFINAG Maut Service GmbH (A-5020 Salzburg, Alpenstraße 99)
ASFINAG  toll stations 
 
Suben motorway border crossing
A-4975 Suben, Suben 89 (bank building), Werner Vogl
open 24 hours a day
Tel. +43 (0) 77113-1582

Kiefersfelden border crossing
ITM Handels GmbH
Motorway filling station and rest area
open 24 hours a day
Tel. +49 (0) 80333-02560
 
Salzburg/Walserberg border crossing
Grenzspedition ASALIS
open: daily from Mon to Sun, from 6:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m.
Tel. +49 (0) 86519-65721
 
Scharnitz border crossing
Grenzwechselstube Steffan
open: daily from 7:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m.
Tel. +43 (0) 52135-306
 
 ALSO REQUIRED FOR REFUNDS: 
 
 Your bank details (sort code, account holder, IBAN and BIC Code)
 Also required for a replacement toll sticker following a total write-off:
 a copy of the second toll sticker or a copy of the purchase invoice
For a refund, please send all documents listed to
ASFINAG Maut Service GmbH
Abt. Vignette/Vignettenersatz
Alpenstraße 99
A-5020 Salzburg
Austria
 
 Attention!  Please note that a replacement toll sticker will only be issued if there are no claims in respect of third parties. What this means in the event of an accident that was caused by the other party involved is that you will also be able to claim your toll sticker and toll sticker costs on the other party's liability insurance.
 
You can obtain more information on the topic of broken windscreens from our ASFINAG Service Centre on 0800 400 12 400 (free from A, D, CH) or +43 (1) 95512-66 (chargeable from all other countries).
